OrgName: Coupons.com Incorporated (f/k/a and a/k/a Coupons, Inc.)
activities: Coupons.com Incorporated collects and stores personal information received from its subsidiary Coupons.com LTD according to its privacy policy located at www.couponsinc.com/privacy.

recoursemech: Coupons.com Incorporated is compliant with the TRUSTe Watchdog Complaint Resolution and Appeals Process for the handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution.
